name: EAT A BITCH
description:
Trigger Warnings: Strong Language &  Depictions of Famous Abusers

EAT A BITCH is a feminist punk game that comments on the need for the complete removal of repeat abusers from public platforms and appearances. 

Designed in a Pac-Man-styled arcade maze, EAT A BITCH allows players to gobble up famous problematic people who are either convicted abusers or rape apologists.

Literally, just eat them all. We don't need them.
